CaseProceedingInfraction.name: CaseProceedingInfraction
CaseProceedingInfraction.description: Represents the association between an infraction and its corresponding case proceeding.

CaseProceedingId.description: The case proceeding associated with the case proceeding infraction record.

InfractionId.description: The infraction associated with the case proceeding record.

InfractionReportingReason.description: The conditions that caused the case proceeding infraction record.

InfractionReportingType.description: The proofs that led to the case proceeding infraction record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the case proceeding infraction record.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the case proceeding infraction record.
